"If you are lucky enough to be born
with the freedom to make your own decisions,
it is your responsibility to
do work that matters."

I strive to leave a positive mark on the world with
words, code, and smart businesses.

Front-end Developer

I'm a self-taught front-end developer and currently freelancing on projects that use Wordpress and modern CSS & Javacsript frameworks. In down-time, I've been learning and building with Angular and the rest of the MEAN stack. Here's my github.

Analytics specialist

I've studied analytics for 5 years in digital and e-Commerce taught me a thing or two about analytics. I'm a huge advocate of distinguishing between vanity metrics and use-metrics and figuring out how to make a product as useful as possible.

Writer

I geek out over words. Might seem unrelated... but I found it goes a long way in groups. By day, I share nonsense, personal revelations, and learnings for future humans on Zenbeard.com.

Human

If I'm not tapping keys, I teach rock-climbing, practice calisthenics, explore movement sports, and cook. People say nice things about my Pumpkin Risotto. I hope you try it someday.

Portfolio
